title: Eric Cantona savages John Stones and his Manchester City flops in withering assessment of Manchester United rivals
text:
Eric Cantona savages John Stones and his Manchester City flops in withering assessment of Manchester United rivals 
United legend Cantona lays in to £50million City star Stones and ridicules the squad of Manchester neighours By Duncan Wright 24th March 2017, 3:06 pm Updated: 24th March 2017, 3:30 pm Comments ERIC CANTONA has launched a stinging attack on the abilities of Manchester City defender John Stones. 
Manchester United legend Cantona mocked England defender Stones in a withering assessment of his talents in an extraordinary attack on rivals City . 3 Eric Cantona delivered a withering assessment of John Stones 
He accused the £50million centre-back of playing like he was pulling a ‘fully equipped trailer’ behind him as well as ridiculing all of Pep Guardiola’s squad. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester City news , gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Cantona was left stunned by City’s dismal display as they crashed out of the Champions League in a 3-1 defeat to Monaco. 3 Eric Cantona savaged John Stones and the rest of the Manchester City squad 
In an video rant for Eurosport , Cantona said: “We know now why John Stones was so expensive – because he comes with a full equipped trailer that he pulls behind him when he plays. 
“Manchester City’s defence are not the only ones to blame for their very own infamous Brexit. “And the attack? Not a single shot in the first 45 minutes. 
“The question now is not who is going to leave when the summer comes, but rather, who is going to stay?” 
United hero Cantona also laid into former Liverpool favourite Luis Suarez for the way he dived to earn Barcelona a penalty in their thrilling Champions League comeback against Paris Saint Germain. 3 John Stones has been accused of playing like he is dragging a trailer behind him 
Cantona added: Suarez is not a biter any more, he’s a diver. Not a very good one, way too dramatic. 
“Such blatant cheating with this hand on the throat, look of agony.” Manchester United legend Eric Cantona savages Manchester City star John Stones
